sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useState } from 'react' import EditeEmployes from './EditEmployee' const Employes = ({item ,index, handelDelet , }) => { const handelDelet1 = (index) => { handelDelet(index) } const [show , setShow] = useState(false) const handelShow = ()=> setShow(true); const handelClose = ()=> setShow(false); return ( <> {item.name} {item.email} {item.address} {item.phone}  handelDelet1(index)} className="delete" data-toggle="modal"> {/* اظهار قائمة اضافة موظف جديد */} Edite Employee ) } export default Employes;
